org.stanwood.media.store.xmlstore
Class BaseXMLStore

java.lang.Object
  org.stanwood.media.util.XMLParser
      org.stanwood.media.store.xmlstore.BaseXMLStore
Direct Known Subclasses:
FilmXMLStore, TVXMLStore
public abstract class BaseXMLStore
extends XMLParser

This is the base class for the XML Store classes. It has the methods which are common between the different store classes.

writeEpsoideExtraInfo

protected void writeEpsoideExtraInfo(org.w3c.dom.Document doc,
                                     org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                     java.lang.String tagLabel,
                                     java.util.List<Link> links)
                              throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerException
This is used to add links to the cache document under the given node.

Parameters:
doc - The document to add the links to
node - The node in the document that the nodes should be appended to
tagLabel - The name of the tag which the nodes will be created under
links - The links to add to the document.
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - Thrown if their is a problem adding the links too the document

urlToText

protected java.lang.String urlToText(java.net.URL url)
Used to convert a URL into text. If the URL is null, then a empty string is returned. This should be used for writing url's too the XML document.

Parameters:
url - The URL to convert to text.
Returns:
The url as a string, or a empty string if the url was null.

                                                             NotInStoreException
Used to read the genres from the XML document

Parameters:
parent - The parent node to read them from
Returns:
A list of genres that were found
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException - Thrown if their is a problem parsing the XML
NotInStoreException - Thrown if the genres are not in the store
